_comment: India compliance norms and standards database. Includes BIS, WPC, TEC, BEE, CDSCO and other Indian regulatory requirements. Updated for 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: Bureau of Indian Standards - Compulsory Registration Scheme
norms.applies_to: Electronics, IT equipment, household appliances in CRS schedule
norms.description: Mandatory registration for products under Compulsory Registration Scheme. Self-certification with testing at BIS-recognized labs. BIS registration mark (ISI mark) required. Covers electronics, IT equipment, household appliances, cables.

norms.name: Information Technology Equipment - Safety - Part 1
norms.description: Indian standard for IT equipment safety. Based on IEC 62368-1. Required for BIS CRS registration of IT products. Covers electrical, fire, mechanical hazards.

norms.name: Safety of Household and Similar Electrical Appliances - Particular Requirements for Stationary Cooking Ranges
norms.description: Indian adoption of IEC 60335 series. Safety requirements for household appliances. Multiple parts for different appliance types. Required for BIS certification.

norms.name: Lithium Batteries - Safety Requirements
norms.description: Indian standard for lithium battery safety. Based on IEC 62133. Required for BIS registration of battery products and power banks. Cell and pack level testing.

norms.name: Information Technology Equipment - Radiated Emissions
norms.description: EMC emission requirements for IT equipment. Based on CISPR 32. Class A and Class B limits. Required for BIS certification.

norms.name: Wireless Planning and Coordination - Equipment Type Approval
norms.applies_to: All radio transmitting equipment including WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular
norms.description: Mandatory approval for radio equipment. Testing at WPC-approved labs (NABL/ILAC accredited). ETA certificate required before import or sale. Covers WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular, IoT devices. WPC marking required.

norms.name: Specific Absorption Rate Requirements
norms.applies_to: Mobile phones and body-worn wireless devices
norms.description: SAR limit: 1.6 W/kg averaged over 1g of tissue (same as US). Testing required for mobile devices. Part of WPC ETA requirements. Must be declared and labeled.

norms.name: Telecom Engineering Centre - Type Approval
norms.description: Mandatory type approval for telecom equipment connecting to networks. Testing at TEC or TEC-accredited labs. Required for switches, routers, modems, VoIP equipment, network equipment.

norms.name: Mandatory Testing and Certification of Telecom Equipment
norms.description: Framework for mandatory testing and certification. Combines safety (BIS), EMI/EMC (TEC), and security requirements. Phased implementation for various product categories.

norms.name: Bureau of Energy Efficiency - Star Labeling Program
norms.description: Mandatory energy efficiency labeling. 1-5 star rating (5 stars most efficient). Required for products in mandatory category. Voluntary for others. Registration with BEE. Standards under Energy Conservation Act.

norms.name: Standards and Labeling Program - Minimum Energy Performance
norms.description: Minimum energy performance standards for appliances and equipment. Products must meet standards before sale in mandatory categories. Covers ACs, refrigerators, fans, pumps, LEDs, more.

norms.name: Central Drugs Standard Control Organization - Medical Device Registration
norms.description: Medical device registration and approval. Classification A, B, C, D based on risk. Import license required. Manufacturing license for domestic production. Quality management system requirements. Under Medical Device Rules 2017.

norms.name: Medical Devices Rules
norms.description: Regulatory framework for medical devices. Classification, registration, licensing, labeling, adverse event reporting. Quality management requirements. Clinical investigation rules.

norms.name: Medical Electrical Equipment - General Requirements for Safety
norms.description: Indian adoption of IEC 60601-1. General safety requirements for medical electrical equipment. Required for medical device registration. EMC requirements in Part 1-2.

norms.name: Automotive Industry Standard - Battery Electric Vehicles Safety
norms.description: Safety requirements for battery electric vehicles. Battery safety, thermal management, crash safety. Mandatory for EV type approval. Covers two-wheelers, three-wheelers, four-wheelers.

norms.name: Central Motor Vehicle Rules - Type Approval
norms.description: Type approval requirements for vehicles. Safety, emissions, construction standards. Aligning with international standards (UN ECE, AIS). Self-certification for some components. ARAI testing.

norms.name: Bharat Stage VI Emission Standards
norms.description: Vehicle emission standards. Equivalent to Euro 6. Mandatory since 2020. Covers criteria pollutants and particulates. Real driving emissions testing introduced.

norms.name: Automotive Industry Standard - Type Approval for Automotive Vehicles
norms.description: Framework for vehicle type approval. References multiple AIS standards for specific requirements. Covers construction, safety devices, emissions, electrical systems.

norms.name: E-Waste (Management) Rules
norms.description: Extended Producer Responsibility for e-waste. Collection targets, channelization to authorized recyclers, reporting. EPR authorization required. Deposit refund scheme for some products.

norms.name: Plastic Waste Management Rules
norms.description: Extended Producer Responsibility for plastic packaging. Collection and recycling targets. Registration on EPR portal. Ban on certain single-use plastics. Affects product packaging.

norms.name: Battery Waste Management Rules 2022
norms.description: EPR for battery waste. Mandatory collection targets. Registration and reporting. Covers all battery types. Importers, manufacturers, dealers all have responsibilities.

norms.name: E-Waste Rules - Restriction of Hazardous Substances
norms.description: Reduction of hazardous substances in EEE. Provisions within E-Waste Rules 2016. Threshold limits for lead, mercury, cadmium, hexavalent chromium, PBBs, PBDEs. No separate RoHS legislation but embedded in e-waste rules.

norms.name: Environment (Protection) Act - Chemical Regulation
norms.description: Regulation of hazardous chemicals under Environment Protection Act. Manufacture, Storage and Import of Hazardous Chemicals Rules. Notification requirements. Material safety data sheets.

norms.name: Hallmarking of Gold and Precious Metals
norms.description: Mandatory hallmarking for gold jewelry. Purity certification by BIS-licensed assaying and hallmarking centers. Consumer protection measure. HUID (Hallmark Unique Identification) required.

norms.name: Safety of Toys and Children's Products
norms.description: Mandatory BIS certification for toys under CRS. Safety requirements based on IS 9873 and IS 15644. Mechanical, physical, chemical, flammability requirements. Third-party testing.

norms.name: Safety of Toys - Part 1: Mechanical and Physical Properties
norms.description: Indian toy safety standard. Based on ISO 8124-1. Mechanical and physical properties requirements. Part of comprehensive IS 9873 series covering flammability and chemical migration.

norms.name: Food Safety and Standards Authority - Food Contact Materials
norms.description: Safety requirements for food contact materials. Standards for plastics, metals, paper, ceramics, glass. Migration limits. Positive lists. Food Safety and Standards Regulations 2011.

norms.name: Food Safety and Standards (Packaging and Labelling) Regulations
norms.description: Requirements for food packaging and labeling. Mandatory declarations, nutritional information, allergen labeling. Vegetarian/non-vegetarian marking (green/brown dot). Package size regulations.

norms.name: Legal Metrology (Packaged Commodities) Rules
norms.description: Mandatory declarations on packaged products. MRP (Maximum Retail Price) declaration required. Net quantity, manufacturing details, importer details. Consumer information protection.

norms.name: Consumer Protection Act
norms.description: Consumer rights framework. Product liability, unfair trade practices, consumer disputes redressal. Central Consumer Protection Authority has recall and enforcement powers.

norms.name: Maximum Retail Price Declaration
norms.description: Mandatory MRP declaration on all packaged commodities. Price inclusive of all taxes. Cannot sell above MRP. Penalties for violations. Under Legal Metrology Rules.

norms.name: Digital Personal Data Protection Act 2023
norms.description: India's comprehensive data privacy law. Consent requirements, data principal rights, obligations of data fiduciaries, cross-border transfers. Enforcement from 2024. Applies to digital personal data.

norms.name: Information Technology (Intermediary Guidelines and Digital Media Ethics Code) Rules
norms.description: Due diligence requirements for intermediaries. Content moderation, grievance redressal, traceability provisions. Affects platforms and digital services.

norms.name: Indian Computer Emergency Response Team - Cybersecurity Directions
norms.applies_to: Service providers, data centers, VPN providers
norms.description: Cybersecurity incident reporting requirements. Synchronization of ICT clocks. Log maintenance. KYC for VPN and cloud providers. Mandatory compliance for service providers.

norms.name: Information Security Management System (Indian Standard)
norms.description: Indian adoption of ISO/IEC 27001. Information security management certification. Increasingly required for IT services, government contracts, critical infrastructure.

norms.name: Aadhaar (Targeted Delivery) Act - Authentication Requirements
norms.description: Requirements for Aadhaar-based authentication. UIDAI registration required for authentication user agencies. Security and privacy requirements. Affects fintech, identity verification services.

norms.name: Electronic Know Your Customer - RBI Guidelines
norms.applies_to: Financial services using digital identity verification
norms.description: Guidelines for electronic KYC using Aadhaar and other methods. Video-based KYC permitted. Affects fintech products and services. Security and audit requirements.

norms.name: Payment and Settlement Systems Act - Authorization
norms.description: Authorization required for operating payment systems. RBI licensing and regulation. Affects digital wallets, payment gateways, UPI apps. Security and interoperability requirements.

norms.name: Central Electricity Authority (Measures Relating to Safety and Electric Supply) Regulations
norms.description: Safety requirements for electrical installations. Standards for equipment, wiring, earthing. Affects building electrical systems and installed equipment. State-level enforcement.

norms.name: Quality Control Orders under BIS Act
norms.description: Mandatory quality certification for products under QCOs. Specific quality parameters must be met. Covers various products from steel to electronics. BIS certification or registration required.

norms.name: Directorate General of Foreign Trade - Import Requirements
norms.description: Import licensing and documentation requirements. IEC (Import Export Code) required. Restricted and prohibited goods lists. Affects customs clearance. Specific requirements for electronics, telecom.

norms.name: National Policy on Electronics - Preferential Market Access
norms.description: Preference for domestically manufactured electronics in government procurement. Phased Manufacturing Program for mobile phones and components. Affects supplier qualification.

norms.name: BIS Product Certification Scheme
norms.description: Voluntary certification scheme for products not under CRS. ISI mark demonstrates compliance with IS standards. Factory inspection and testing. Market recognition and preference.

norms.name: Bureau of Indian Standards - Gems and Jewellery Standards
norms.description: Standards for gems and jewelry. Diamond grading, gemstone identification, jewelry manufacturing. BIS certification and hallmarking programs.

norms.name: Textile and Apparel Standards
norms.description: BIS standards for textiles and apparel. Quality, safety, labeling requirements. Mandatory for some products (baby garments, safety wear). Care labeling requirements.

norms.name: Green Building Certification - GRIHA/IGBC
norms.description: Green building rating systems (GRIHA, IGBC LEED India). Voluntary but increasingly required for government and commercial projects. Affects building materials and systems.

norms.name: Fire Safety - National Building Code
norms.applies_to: Building products and fire safety equipment
norms.description: Fire safety requirements from National Building Code. Fire resistance, alarm systems, suppression systems. Fire NOC required for buildings. Affects electrical equipment and building materials.

norms.name: Legal Metrology - Weights and Measures
norms.description: Standards and verification for weights, measures, weighing instruments. Mandatory verification for instruments used in trade. Model approval and stamping requirements.

norms.name: Quality Management Systems (Indian Standard)
norms.description: Indian adoption of ISO 9001. Quality management system certification. NAB (National Accreditation Board) accredits certification bodies. Important for supplier qualification.
